WorkItem.Description:
A Filter for the Updatelist like in the WSUS-Console would be nice.

For example just display Updates which have Approval "Not Approved" and Status "Needed".

Comments.Message:
Hi, you can already achieve this by filter on "Not installed" and sort the column 'Status':

![FilterDisplay](http://i.imgur.com/ljaWO4v.jpg)

Yes, but i can not filter the complete Update-liste (above the status Tab).

Examble usage: 

- Just want to see the Updates which are needed (currently you have to look at every single Update to see which are needed)
- Do not want to see Declined Updates.
I'll keep this request for release V2.
